name: Airplane Flight Pilot 2016 – Xtreme Plane Flying Simulation
name_original: Airplane Flight Pilot 2016 – Xtreme Plane Flying Simulation
description:
This 2016 real flight pilot simulator takes you on an exotic journey amidst the beautiful city islands. In the airplane pilot simulator, get your hands on the most realistic pilot controller and fly the passenger and cargo aircraft. Make your Piloting dream come true without airplane flying lessons, pilot training or GDP license.

This Extreme pilot flight simulator 2016 will take you to new heights and let you fly where you have never been before. With bombastic 5 flying missions and a variety of planes to unlock. Collect coins and complete levels asap to earn more money. Are you a new flight pilot or have you trained from a pilot school? Pick your mission and start your plane engine. The most realistic flight simulator bundled with X-Plane 10, Yoke & Throttle, and Rudders is in your iPhone phones. Takeoff from the tycoon islands, flying some of the most iconic aircraft to another city tycoon island. Plan your own flight path in Free Flight mode or test your flying prowess in time critical missions. Get ready for an authentically accurate aerial experience for airplane simulation enthusiasts dynamic, living world that brings a realistic Salt Lake City flying experience to your iOS device. Enjoy the peace and tranquility of the plane flying from Tycoon Island to the other. Take your job as a Flight pilot in this awesome 2016 Airplane Pilot Simulator.

Take to the Skies in the World's Favorite Flight Simulator! Play this passenger plane simulator 3D battle royal with friends and find out who is the best pilot. Download this Amazing Airplane Flight Pilot 2016 Simulator today and enjoy the beautiful view of mountainous lake city islands.
